Salt_Lake_City.Beehive House:
The Beehive House was one of the official residences of Brigham Young, an early leader of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints (LDS Church). The Beehive House gets its name from the beehive sculpture atop the house.


== Executive Mansion of Brigham Young ==
The Beehive house was constructed in 1854, two years before the neighboring Lion House was built (also a residence of Young's).
